item.title: Remi add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "In this dirty minded world, you are either someone's wife or someone's whore. And if you're not either people think there is something wrong with you....but there is nothing wrong with me" -- John Irving

item.title: Remi add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "In the world according to Garp, we are all terminal cases" -- John Irving

item.title: Remi add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "He also knew that rivals are best unmanned by being ignored." -- John Irving

item.title: Remi add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Your memory is a monster; you forget—it doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you—and summons them to your recall with will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!" -- John Irving

item.title: Remi add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
Remi add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Remi add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "You can't just eat good food. You've got to talk about it too. And you've got to talk about it to somebody who understands that kind of food." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Remi add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou
